reviewText: When I got this in the mail there was a footprint on the outside pkg.  When I opened it the case was cracked but the DVD inside was fine. Luckily I had an extra case to put it in. It happens.
This movie is for anyone who enjoys action and special effects! It is engaging and entertaining to say the least. It is one that you will watch over and over again!!

I bought the Billy Blazes firetruck for my grandson who is almost 2, and got two Rescue Heros DVDs to go along with it.  Billy Blazes figure comes with the firetruck.  He enjoys watching the DVD, which features Billy Blaze, and it is in 11 minute segments, so works for him now at 11 - 20 minutes and he will definitely grow with it. I bought it after reading Amazon reviews and it has lived up to the reviews. The goal is to give Alex some idea of what rescue people do and ideas for play with his firetruck.
These guys are great for your kids from 2 to ?.  The toys are very durable and the movies are great with a message about safety at the end.

This story is about overcoming fear.  Also a family-bonding theme. One of the firemen imagines fire as a living monster, which is depicted as such in the cartoon.  This did not seem to bother my children.
